PHRASE.LANG: You have to buy the camouflaged jacket but the grenade bandoliers and an RPG are included for free! [#Legal]
Si vous achetez la veste de camouflage, la bandoulière grenade et un lance-roquette vous seront offerts ! [#Legal]
Die Tarnjacke müssen Sie kaufen, aber Granatengurt und Panzerfaust gibt es gratis dazu! [#Legal]
La giacca mimetica la devi comprare, ma le bandoliere per le granate e l'RPG sono gratis! [#Legal]
La chaqueta de camuflaje la tienes que comprar, ¡pero las trinchas portagranadas y el lanzagranadas se incluyen de regalo! [#Legal]
You have to buy the camouflaged jacket but the grenade bandoliers and an RPG are included for free! [#Legal]
